original_text: He must give a sheep or a goat for a sin offering. Then the Lord will not be angry with him. The priest will kill the animal as a sacrifice to atone for that sin.
korean_text: 그 잘못으로 말미암아 여호와께 속죄제를 드리되 양 떼의 암컷 어린 양이나 염소를 끌어다가 속죄제를 드릴 것이요 제사장은 그의 허물을 위하여 속죄할지니라

sentences.original_text: He must give a sheep or a goat
Then the Lord will not be angry with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주께서 그에게 진노하지 않으실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The priest will kill the animal
as a sacrifice to atone for that sin
